short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read the option LTP and calculate premium left

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin currently works only with NSE Option Chain web page and developed for getting premium left for options and the difference. After loading the page, wait for 3 secs to show the premium left for options.
